description: Back by popular demand, the best-selling Alpine Onset Merino 150 base layer collection is made up of a soft merino wool blended with a recycled polyester for added durability and moisture management. The perfect base layer for cool-to-cold temperatures, and layers comfortably underneath midlayers and shells for more extreme weather.
name: Alpine Onset Merino 150 Crew - Mens

specs.value: 47% Merino Wool, 47% Recycled Polyester (Repreve), 6% Elastane Jersey
